sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: E2fsprogs-&e2fsprogs-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, strip diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, sync gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0 glibc: ldconfig grep: egrep, grep gzip: gzip make: make mawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, echo, expr, hostname, uname texinfo: makeinfo textutils: cat, tr
